message.body: you done work?
yea
im writing you an email
oh! :)
not anymore. i was just replying to your email about the trip
ok, it's just a thought.
I will look into the cabin/hotel thing to see whats out there
but yeah i thought about your birthday before as a good time for a trip
It will be hot though. But probably no more hot than it will be here. And it won't be humid
I have friends that have been out to AZ that could probaby give us some tips
we'll be sure to stay somewhere with AC
me too, Colleen lived there for a bit and did this outdoor wilderness therapy thing for troubled teens
I was on craigslist and it looks like there are some decent vacation rentals in sedona/flagstaff area. If we go from like a sunday through thrusday I think we could save some money
yea thats usually the way to go
airfare is cheaper that way too
but we have time and I have alot to get done the next few weeks
k. No problem. Any luck on better options for the windows?
not yet. I got homeowners ins though, its $497 a year
that's not bad
nah not bad, about what I expected
K. well I don't want to keep you from your business. I barely made it through the day and can't wait to go home and rest
why?
I am just very tired. Got my period and had a very rushed and busy morning.
oh I see
well rest up buttercup and hopefully I will see you in a few days
Yep, But only if I go out there ;) Just Kidding. I just know that you will be busy especially in the next week
